001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.HashMap;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
014import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock;
015import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
016import java.util.stream.Stream;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
020
021public class FunctionLibrary implements IFunctionLibrary {
022
023  @NonNull
024  private final Map<IEnhancedQName, NamedFunctionSet> libraryByQName = new HashMap<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
025  @NonNull
026  private final ReadWriteLock instanceLock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
027
028  /**
029   * Register the provided function signature.
030   *
031   * @param function
032   *          the function signature to register
033   * @throws IllegalArgumentException
034   *           if the provided function has the same arity as a previously
035   *           registered function with the same name
036   */
037  public final void registerFunction(@NonNull IFunction function) {
038    registerFunctionByQName(function);
039  }
040
041  private void registerFunctionByQName(@NonNull IFunction function) {
042    IEnhancedQName qname = function.getQName();
043    IFunction duplicate;
044    Lock writeLock = instanceLock.writeLock();
045    writeLock.lock();
046    try {
047      NamedFunctionSet functions = libraryByQName.get(qname);
048      if (functions == null) {
049        functions = new NamedFunctionSet();
050        libraryByQName.put(qname, functions);
051      }
052      duplicate = functions.addFunction(function);
053    } finally {
054      writeLock.unlock();
055    }
056    if (duplicate != null) {
057      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Duplicate functions with same arity: %s shadows %s",
058          duplicate.toSignature(), function.toSignature()));
059    }
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public Stream<IFunction> stream() {
064    Lock readLock = instanceLock.readLock();
065    readLock.lock();
066    try {
067      return ObjectUtils.notNull(libraryByQName.values().stream().flatMap(NamedFunctionSet::getFunctionsAsStream));
068    } finally {
069      readLock.unlock();
070    }
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public IFunction getFunction(@NonNull IEnhancedQName name, int arity) {
075    IFunction retval = null;
076    Lock readLock = instanceLock.readLock();
077    readLock.lock();
078    try {
079      NamedFunctionSet functions = libraryByQName.get(name);
080      if (functions != null) {
081        retval = functions.getFunctionWithArity(arity);
082      }
083    } finally {
084      readLock.unlock();
085    }
086    return retval;
087  }
088
089  private static class NamedFunctionSet {
090    private final Map<Integer, IFunction> arityToFunctionMap;
091    private IFunction unboundedArity;
092
093    public NamedFunctionSet() {
094      this.arityToFunctionMap = new HashMap<>();
095    }
096
097    @SuppressWarnings("null")
098    @NonNull
099    public Stream<IFunction> getFunctionsAsStream() {
100      return arityToFunctionMap.values().stream();
101    }
102
103    @Nullable
104    public IFunction getFunctionWithArity(int arity) {
105      IFunction retval = arityToFunctionMap.get(arity);
106      if (retval == null && unboundedArity != null && unboundedArity.arity() < arity) {
107        retval = unboundedArity;
108      }
109      return retval;
110    }
111
112    @Nullable
113    public IFunction addFunction(@NonNull IFunction function) {
114      IFunction old = arityToFunctionMap.put(function.arity(), function);
115      if (function.isArityUnbounded()) {
116        unboundedArity = function;
117      }
118      return old;
119    }
120  }
121}
